author: Epic Games
description:
For the first time ever, get three days of free access to Path of Exile 2! Explore new acts, face new bosses and resist the Rise of the Abyssal in Path of Exile 2’s new update, the Third Edict! 
Play it free from August 29 to September 1: https://epic.gm/PoE2-free-weekend
title: Path of Exile 2 | Free To Play Weekend

author: Epic Games
description:
Battlefield 6 brings the most advanced PC experience in franchise history with 4K visuals, uncapped frame rates, ultrawide support, and over 600 customization options. Protected by Javelin Anti-Cheat and powered by Intel XeSS, NVIDIA DLSS, and AMD FSR, this is Battlefield built for the ultimate PC experience.
 
Portal returns as the ultimate sandbox - bigger, faster, and more flexible than ever. Build it. Share it. Play it. With full progression, the battlefield is yours to shape.
 
 Battlefield your way. On PC, October 10.

Pre-purchase now: https://epic.gm/battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6 | Official PC Trailer

author: Epic Games
description: Lost Soul Aside is available now! Embark on an epic odyssey to save your sister and the whole of humankind from dimensional invaders. https://epic.gm/lost-soul-aside
title: Lost Soul Aside | Launch Trailer
